scripts.migrate:prod: assume-role production node knexenv && env-cmd .env node_modules/.bin/knex migrate:latest --env production
scripts.migrate:stage: assume-role staging node knexenv && env-cmd .env node_modules/.bin/knex migrate:latest --env staging
scripts.migrate:dev: assume-role development node knexenv && env-cmd .env node_modules/.bin/knex migrate:latest --env development
scripts.rollback:prod: assume-role production node knexenv && env-cmd .env node_modules/.bin/knex migrate:rollback --env production
scripts.rollback:stage: assume-role staging node knexenv && env-cmd .env node_modules/.bin/knex migrate:rollback --env staging
scripts.rollback:dev: assume-role development node knexenv && env-cmd .env node_modules/.bin/knex migrate:rollback --env development
scripts.seed:prod: assume-role production node knexenv && env-cmd .env node_modules/.bin/knex seed:run --env production
scripts.seed:stage: assume-role staging node knexenv && env-cmd .env node_modules/.bin/knex seed:run --env staging
scripts.seed:dev: assume-role development node knexenv && env-cmd .env node_modules/.bin/knex seed:run --env development
scripts.psql:prod: assume-role production node knexenv && env-cmd .env sh ./scripts/psql.sh
scripts.psql:stage: assume-role staging node knexenv && env-cmd .env sh ./scripts/psql.sh
scripts.psql:dev: assume-role development node knexenv && env-cmd .env sh ./scripts/psql.sh
